CustomField.description: For a usage asset associated with a wallet (one-to-one relationship only), this will validate the usage processing entries where the negative amount (to be added back to the wallet) exceeds the wallet's consumed amount.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Validate negative usage for an asset linked to a single wallet can not be processed if the rated amount is more then consumed amount.
CustomField.label: Validate Usage Reversal
